mapper.select: select permission_name from rwj_user u left outer join rwj_user_permission up on u.id = up.user_id left outer join rwj_permission p ON p.id = up.permission_id where username = #{username};
select role_name from rwj_user u left outer join rwj_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left outer join rwj_role p ON p.id = ur.role_id where username = #{username};
